# 7.0 Docs

- [Breaking change: Binding config to dictionary extends values](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/7.0/config-bind-dictionary.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in .NET extensions where binding a configuration to a dictionary extends collection values instead of replacing the entire collection for a key.
- [Breaking change: ContentRootPath for apps launched by Windows Shell](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/7.0/contentrootpath-hosted-app.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in .NET extensions where the 'ContentRootPath' property no longer defaults to the current directory for apps launched by Windows Shell or services.exe.
- [Breaking change: Environment variable prefixes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/extensions/7.0/environment-variable-prefix.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in .NET extensions where the comparison of normalized prefixes and environment variables has changed.
